name: Tanky Tank Tank
description:
Click on the map to send your tiny tank scurrying around. It will auto-fire at enemy tanks if they are in its sights.

My #onegameamonth for August 2018.

Sprites by Kenney:

  • https://kenney.nl/assets/topdown-tanks-redux
  • https://kenney.nl/assets/roguelike-modern-city

Font is Funhouse by Darryl Flood:

  • http://www.fontspace.com/darrell-flood/funhouse

SFX generated by a combination of BFXR, Audacity, and rubbing two porcupines together.
